Headline: Temporary #30 South Chicago Reroute at Ewing/93rd
ShortDescription: 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted near Ewing/93rd

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 92nd, Harbor, South Chicago, 95th, Ewing, and resume normal route: due to street blockage near Ewing/93rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #75 74th-75th Reroute near 75th/Philips
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses temp. rerouted due to, street blockage near 75th/Philips.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 75th/Philips.

Westbound #75 74th-75th buses will operate via 75th, Exchange, 76th, Yates, 75th, and resume normal route.

Eastbound #75 74th-75th buses will operate via 75th, Yates, 76th, Coles, 75th, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
